abstract: Kai-Fu Lee, the president of Google’s operations in China, is leaving the company for an unspecified new venture.
snippet: Kai-Fu Lee, the president of Google’s operations in China, is leaving the company for an unspecified new venture.
lead_paragraph: In what is likely to be seen as a blow to Google‘s ambitions in China, Kai-Fu Lee, the prominent head of the company’s operations there, is leaving for an unspecified new venture.

abstract: Kai-Fu Lee, the prominent head of the company’s operations there, will be part of a new venture, which was not specified.

abstract: Google’s Spotlight reveals a deeper take on the news content.
snippet: Google’s Spotlight reveals a deeper take on the news content.
lead_paragraph: It’s great that among all of the RSS feeds, Google News arrays and e-mail alerts, we all can reside at the white hot nexus of news, but every once in a while when you are looking for diversions or informational enhancement, it would be nice to jack into something a little less of-the-moment and a little more nutritious. And guess what? Google has you covered. Again.

headline.main: Google Shines a Deeper Spotlight on News
